# AI Sidekick

> Add your description here

## Installation

```bash
uv sync
```

## Usage

```bash
# Run the CLI
uv run ai-sidekick

# Or run the module directly
uv run python -m ai_sidekick
```

## Development

```bash
# Install development dependencies
uv sync --dev

# Run tests
uv run pytest

# Run linting
uv run ruff check .

# Format code
uv run ruff format .
```
